title: Kaczka Mazurska – Matured Mazurian Duck | Bastion Smaku
content: Subtle, ripening duck breast, which amazes with its softness and wild, sweet & spicy taste. We have carefully combined ethereal caraway with mild coriander to emphasize the valuable qualities of duck meat. Various peppers, headed by the expressive “peperoncino” peppers, are spiciness. Lovage combines everything wisely and brings out the richness of aromas, deliciously giving connoisseurs romantic dizziness.
